effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately. If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect. If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move’s damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

short_effect.sword_shield: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
short_effect.legends_arceus: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
